entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:37 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
